text: @realDonaldTrump Honestly - is that all you care about?  How many of your mainstream followers are investors in the DOW Jones Industrial Average, and the S&P?  Meanwhile the deaths from COVID-19 are over 100,000 and may even be much more than. What an absolutely cold and heartless man you are.
